name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DAZN - Watch Live Sports in PiP

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DAZN for the best in live boxing, MMA & on demand sports streaming.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
DAZN for the best in live boxing, MMA, and on-demand sports streaming. This extension allows you to watch DAZN content in Picture in Picture mode, giving you the freedom to keep your favorite matches in view while multitasking on your device. Never miss a moment of your favorite fights and live events with the convenience of PiP.

Features:

Picture in Picture (PiP) Mode: Watch your favorite DAZN sports content while browsing other sites.
Live and On-Demand Streaming: Access live boxing, MMA, and a wide variety of sports content from DAZN.
Easy Activation: Just click the PiP button to pop out the video and enjoy the action anywhere on your screen.
Seamless Integration: Works directly on the DAZN website, bringing you uninterrupted sports streaming in a floating window.
Automatic Activation: Opens important sports and news sites automatically to keep you updated right after installation.
Enjoy the ultimate sports viewing experience with DAZN PiP and never miss another moment of your favorite matches and events!
PiP also works on other sites!
































the extension has a premium version for $19.99
